channel.title: 1.0.2 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Deathnotes have been reenabled. There is now a report button when another player's deathnote is displayed. * Death betting has been changed. You no longer bet gold. You now make predictions about who will die or be executed, and if you are correct you will win extra gold at the end of the game.
## Alchemist: * Stoneskin is now usable throughout the entire day, and can be used day 1. * New passive, Coagulate, makes Alchemist immune to bleeding.
## Assassin: * Removed Forage. * Nightshade now has 2 uses. * New night ability called '2-For-1' has been added. The Assassin can kill two players in one night. Has 1 use. * The uses for Nightshade and 2-For-1 transfer between Assassins.
## Court Wizard: * Magical Barrier now notifies you if it blocks something.
## Drunk: * Happy Hour now also occupies the player for the night.
## Fool & Scorned: * When Trollbox is used on a player, that player will not see the message sent.
## Hunter: * Can no longer use Wolf until Night 3.
## Knight: * Can no longer use Cold Steel until Night 3.
## Mastermind: * Dirty Work can't be used unless there are less than 7 players alive.
## Prince: * Can no longer use Execute until Night 3.
## Bug Fixes: * Fixed some Possessor bugs. * Fixed Fool's room not appearing during the death recap on the lowest settings. * Fixed Possessor bleeding while controlling someone into the Hunter's Spike Traps. * Fixed some game over conditions. * Possible fixes to some issues with the chat not appearing. * Reconnection screen in lobby should show normally again * Message popups should be more stable * Fixed font for ban notifications (hopefully you didn't know about this bug ha) * You can now cancel reports at end screen * Some others.

item.description:
Prince doesn’t have to CC. He can jail him each night to ensure he’s staying jailed, to then execute him when he’s got the chance to.

ALTERNATIVELY. If prince dies before that, THEY WILL KNOW HE’S SCUM THERE’S NO WINNING

item.dc:creator: Luxx

LMAO that’s such an awful strategy??
Cause a false Prince claim can just be executed by REAL prince later.

ALSO UNSEEN AND CULT AND NEUTRAL KILLERS WOULD WANT HIM DEAD AS THEY’D THINK HE’S THE REAL PRINCE THERE’S NO WINNING

item.title: 1.0.2 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
See it like this;
BD killings who attack someone N1 or N2 are either trolls who want to cause chaos, or they’re following the YOLO strategy which mostly ever harms BD.

What this update does is make these “strategies” impossible

And since I’ve understood you play more FoL than ToL… You can just make it so BD can kill whenever instead of having this anti-troll wait. Since I assume FoL has less trolls.

Read full topic

they claim prince, but aren’t
real prince has to wait 2 days to do anything

item.title: 1.0.2 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
Yeah but it’s not “fine” for the rest of the BD.
Prince losing his exes cause he just YOLOs N2 is NOT good for BD.

Knight Cold Steeling randomly N1-N2 cause “maybe he can get assassin or neutrals” is NOT good for BD as he’ll most likely cause his own death.

Usually Prince, Knight and Hunters who kill N1 or N2 do it as a “YOLO” strategy, cause they don’t care. (Or cause they’re trolling)
It’s really no good point in letting them be able to YOLO kill people.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.2 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Ellie:

How is having to wait 1 more day to kill and “immense” nerf? How often are you finding scum on day 2?

Finding scum on Day 2 is not an uncommon occurrence, especially in a game where you have Power Investigatives.

The Prince will be forced to jail a scum player N2 just to listen to them mock and laugh at the execution-less Prince until N3 comes around. The Prince must waste an entire night to occupy the scum player and wait for his eventual execution on N3.

I know what you’re going to say - “Then just hang the scum player during the day!”

The real point here is this is an enormous buff to the Fool which indirectly buffs the scum teams. This change will encourage Jestering Day 2 because the Fool knows they cannot die that night. If scum do get caught Day 2 (which happens much more often than people imagine), they can just jester their way out of executions for a day, which is a big deal. Every night is crucial in this game.

Read full topic
